actions.description:
The berbalang makes one Bite attack and one

Claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description:
The berbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
At will: speak with dead

1/day each: plane shift (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting
